Contact the City
----------------

**The City recently partnered with TextMyGov to allow you to**
**sign up to receive text alerts from the City.**

![ShavanoParkTX-TextMyGov-5Alerts-1](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/TextMyGov/ShavanoParkTX-TextMyGov-5Alerts-1.png?t=202507080846210)

* - to receive City-wide emergency alerts (recommended!)
* - to receive information about City-wide events (non-emergency)

![TextMyGov Keywords QR](http://www.shavanoparktx.gov/TextMyGov/TextMyGov%20Keywords%20QR.jpg?t=202507080846220)
View TextMyGov's terms and privacy policy at
<https://textmygov.com/opt-in-terms-conditions/>
**This same program allows you find information and report issues easily by text as well!
Try it today - Text**
**"Hi" to
210.853.2003
. For a full listing of words for reports and information you can visit
[here](https://app-api.textmygov.com/word-setup/327)
.**
